column24:
[Attack (Set) - Area (S) - Impede - Delay+15]
(Class C) Slashes foes while dashing by them. Unbalance+10%.

[Support - Area (XL/Self) - STR+25% - CP+10]
An encouraging shout to rouse allies to battle.

[Attack (Set) - Line (S) - Delay+30]
(Class B) Unleashes an arc-shaped shock wave. Can unbalance.

[Attack - Area (L) - Seal (50%)]
(Class A) Slices up enemies at high speed. Unbalance+20%.

[Attack (Set) - Area (S) - Burn (50%) - Faint (50%)]
(Class S+) A powerful downward slash. Unbalance+30%.

[Attack - One - Impede - Burn (50%)]
(Class B) Pierces enemy with a burning arrow. Unbalance+20%.

[Recovery (Set) - Area (S) - HP Heal (S) - CP+40]
Fires a blessed arrow into the air, healing allies in an area.

[Attack (Set) - Area (L)]
(Class C) Rains burning arrows onto enemies. Can unbalance.

[Support (Set) - Area (M) - Insight - CP Regen]
Grants allies insight status and restores 20CP every turn.

[Support (Set) - Area (M) - DEF+25% - HP Regen]
Boosts the DEF of allies by 25% and heals 30% HP every turn.

[Magic Attack (Set) - Area (M) - Sleep (30%)]
(Class C) Lulls foes to sleep with soothing sounding bubbles.

[Recovery - Area (L/Self) - HP Heal (M) - Cures all bar K.O.]
Purifies allies with a holy song.

[Magic Attack (Set) - Area (L) - Sleep (50%) Nightmare (30%)]
(Class A) Steals foes' consciousness with silver bells.

[Support - One - Analysis - Balance Down]
Analyzes an enemy, making it easier to unbalance them.

[Attack - One - DEF-25% - Seal (30%)]
(Class A+) Tears the armor from enemies. Unbalance+30%.

[Attack (Set) - Line (M) - MOV-50%]
(Class B) Splits the earth beneath foes' feet. Unbalance+10%.

[Attack (Set) - Area (L) - Suction - Faint (30%)]
(Class S) Draws foes into a vortex of light. Can unbalance.

[Support - Self - STR/DEF+50% - Insight - ATS/ADF-50%]
Increases physical abilities at the expense of magical ones.

[Attack - One - Impede - DEF-25%]
(Class A) Fires an armor-piercing round. Unbalance+20%.

[Recovery - Area (M) - HP/EP Heal (25%)]
Launches a special recovery bullet filled with energy.

[Attack - Area (L) - Petrify (50%)]
(Class B) Fires a bullet that can petrify. Can unbalance.

[Support - Area (M) - Accelerate]
Breaks the time barrier, allowing allies to act faster.

[Recovery - One - Cures K.O. - HP Heal (50%) - CP+20]
Heals an ally with the calm of the moon.

[Magic Attack (Set) - Line (M) - ATS-50%]
(Class B) Releases several magical blades. Unbalance+10%.

[Support - Area (M) - DEF+50% - Magic Reflect]
Strengthens allies with the crescent moon's power.

[Magic Attack - Area (L) - Burn (30%) Confuse (30%)]
(Class A) Muddles an enemy's cognitive abilities with flame.

[Support - One - Analysis - Balance Down]
Analyzes an enemy, making it easier to unbalance them.

[Attack - One - Impede - Delay+30]
(Class A) A series of three rapid thrusts. Unbalance+20%.

[Magic Attack - Area (M) - ADF-50%]
(Class B) Cuts enemies in half with a magical slash.

[Support - Area (XL/Self) - STR/ATS/SPD+25%]
Raises the morale of allies with an inspiring shout.

[Attack (Set) - Area (M) - Seal (50%) Freeze (50%)]
(Class A) Seals foes in ice, then shatters it. Unbalance+20%.

[Attack - Area (M) - Impede - SPD-25%]
(Class B) Mows down foes with twin gunswords. Can unbalance.

[Attack - Area (L) - Blind (30%) Seal (30%)]
(Class D) Throws a grenade which emits bright light.

[Attack (Set) - Line (S) - Faint (30%) K.O. (30%)]
(Class A) Strikes enemies' weak points. Unbalance+20%.

[Attack - Area (M) - Seal (50%) - Delay+35]
(Class S+) Dominates foes with rapid attacks. Unbalance+30%.

[Attack (Set) - Line (S) - Seal (50%)]
(Class C) Launches a blast of wind forwards. Can unbalance.

[Attack - Area (M) - Blind (50%)]
(Class A) Envelops foes in turbulent winds. Unbalance+10%.

[Support - Self - HP-30% - CP+50]
Cries out with wild anger, trading HP for CP.

[Attack (Set) - Area (M) - MOV-50% - Delay+35]
(Class S+) Skewers foes with great force. Unbalance+20%.

[Attack - Area (M) - Impede - Faint (50%)]
(Class B) Airgetlam attacks with great force. Unbalance+20%.

[Support - Self - Physical Immunity]
Creates a silver barrier, granting immunity to one attack.

[Attack (Set) - Line (M) - STR-25%]
(Class A) Airgetlam fires a beam of light.

[Attack - Area (L) - Faint (70%) - Delay+40]
(Class S) Airgetlam crushes foes as a sphere. Unbalance+30%.

[Attack (Set) - Area (M) - Delay+15]
(Class C) Fires a series of rapid shots. Can unbalance.

[Magic Attack (Set) - Area (M) - Freeze (50%)]
(Class C) Fires a magical bullet imbued with the power of ice.

[Support - One - Random effect on ally or enemy]
Draws a card, leaving everything to chance. What will happen?

[Attack (Set) - Line (M) - Confuse (50%) Nightmare (50%)]
(Class S) Fires a bullet of pure insanity. Can unbalance.

[Attack - Area (L) - Seal (90%) - SPD-25%]
(Class B) Attacks with bullets and lightning. Unbalance+10%.

[Support - Self - STR/SPD+50% - Insight]
Raises physical abilities with a war cry.

[Attack (Set) - Area (M) - Seal (30%) - Delay+30]
(Class S) Overtakes foes like a lightning bolt. Unbalance+30%.

[Attack (Set) - Line (S) - Impede - Delay+20]
(Class C) A kick that releases a shock wave. Unbalance+10%.

[Attack - One - Faint (90%)]
(Class S) A blast of energy from close range. Unbalance+50%.

[Support - Self - STR/DEF+50%]
Strengthens the body through an explosion of energy.
